attributes.action: For GCSE and A-Level exams 2020 to be examined a different way
attributes.additional_details:
Teachers can have unfair views on students for a number of different reasons, which may mean that grades may not be as accurate as they should be.
For example;
- Some students have not had one permenant teacher due to teachers leaving their jobs
- Some teachers do not even know the names of their students
- Mock exams may not show the full representation of a student
- Some schools have not written their students grades down correctly which shows inaccuracy on their academic performance
- ETC
attributes.background: To find a different way to examine GCSE and A-Level exams rather having teachers decides individuals grades with teacher assessments

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306773.
